Module com.example.assignment
Package com.example.assignment

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.assignment.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The controller class manages the interactions between the user interface and the model in the application.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the SQLite database connection

    • newStudent

      public void newStudent(javafx.scene.control.TextField nameField, javafx.scene.control.TextField numberField, javafx.scene.control.TextField dob, javafx.scene.control.TextField semesterField)
      Adds a new student to the SQLite database
      Parameters:
      nameField - The text field for entering the student's name
      numberField - The text field for entering the student's number
      dob - The text field for entering the student's date of birth
      semesterField - The text field for entering the student's semester

    • removeStudent

      public void removeStudent(javafx.scene.control.TextField numberField)
      Removes the student with the given student number from both the studentList and the database.
      Parameters:
      numberField - The TextField containing the student number of the student to remove.

    • removeModule

      public void removeModule(javafx.scene.control.TextField addcodeField)
      Removes the module with the given code from the database.
      Parameters:
      addcodeField - The TextField containing the code of the module to remove.

    • removeRecord

      public void removeRecord(javafx.scene.control.TextField pickModuleField, javafx.scene.control.TextField pickStudentField)
      This method removes a record from the database.
      Parameters:
      pickModuleField - TextField that contains the module code for the record to be deleted.
      pickStudentField - TextField that contains the name of the student for the record to be deleted.

    • editRecord

      public void editRecord(javafx.scene.control.TextField pickModuleField, javafx.scene.control.TextField pickStudentField, javafx.scene.control.TextField addGradeField)
      This method edits a record in the database.
      Parameters:
      pickModuleField - TextField that contains the module code for the record to be edited.
      pickStudentField - TextField that contains the name of the student for the record to be edited.
      addGradeField - TextField that contains the new grade for the record to be edited.
